channel.title: Unique RSPS Ideas
channel.description:
I'm looking for a few ideas of a "theme" for an rsps, examples are Rome 718 is based on rome and End Point - Apocalyptic Survival is based on zombies. Reason I want this is so I can make something unique and fun for both me and the people playing. For me it's hard to find a fun rsps now a days because they all are the same and have been the same for a while now. If you have a few ideas that could be added to the server aswell please make sure to post them. If you have a preferred revision feel free to post that as that isn't decided yet either.
Thanks in advanced to anyone who helps.

item.title: Unique RSPS Ideas
item.dc:creator: @firstchoice8 firstchoice8
item.description:
@firstchoice8 wrote:

[quote=“Blazingbells, post:2, topic:539853”]Second time typing this :mad:

You need something new, not many people worry about the map due to the fact most people like the Runescape map.
Some simple things I always see missing are:

-Complete Map
-Simple/Complex Quests: Something that we will appreciate.
-Inventive AI: Sick of old “Stand there and butcher him AI” Make us fear enemies.
-Thought/A Plan: Most servers are put together by 6 or more people so there’s very rarely a plan.

Some ideas that might get the juices flowin:
Undead Cities, Demon caves, OH No!, Gods, Defence, Work[/quote]
Thanks

Clawz fury:

doubt anyone including me is going to post their unique ideas for you to steal. look for inspiration instead. inspiration always gets the juices flowing

Thanks for the reply, as Arham said I got good replies from rune-server, I was more looking for ideas from people who weren’t developing something but had a good idea I guess, or people who can’t program and wanted something cool and fun added to a server they wanted to play.

Read full topic
